titles.title: McLoughlin House National Historic Site Act

A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the McLoughlin House National Historic Site in Oregon City, Oregon, for inclusion in the Fort Vancouver National Historic Site, and for other purposes.
McLoughlin House National Historic Site Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 108-59.

bill.summary: McLoughlin House National Historic Site Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the McLoughlin House National Historic Site (that includes the McLoughlin House, the Barclay House, and associated real property, improvements, and personal property) in Oregon City, Oregon, for inclusion in the Fort Vancouver National Historic Site.
